title: [FSX/FS9] Dispatch Planner X
description:
Make your pre-flight quicker and easier with Dispatch Planner X.
Dispatch Planner X includes new advanced features such as full Nav Log with leg times, advanced fuel calculation and Load Sheet.

A breakdown of fuel, aircraft weights (retrieved from FS), airframe limit weights, flight-plan, weather, loadsheet and other information can be generated for each and every flight in just a few clicks of the mouse.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Easy to use interface. Make the planning process as simple or as detailed as you like.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Compatible with both FSX and FS9
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Save and retrieve flight details quickly and easily, upload to server to share with other users
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Log of previously Saved Flights allows quick loading into the program
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Choice of Kilograms (KG's) or Pounds (LB's) as mass unit
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Print All documentation quickly and easily
 
Dispatch Sheet/Nav Log
 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Detailed Nav Log
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Automatic retrieval of airfield elevations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Aircraft Performance data for many airframes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢  Accurate Fuel Planner with figures for Trip, Contingency, Alternate, Hold Final Reserve etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fuel Tankering
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quick, easy access to web-based flight-plan websites, to use with Dispatch Planner
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full flight-plan parsing including distance, flight-time and fuel used for each leg
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic retrieval of ZFW (Zero Fuel Weight) from ALL installed FS aircraft
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic retrieval of payload from ALL installed FS Aircraft
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Database of Airfields, Runways, VORs, NDBs, Intersections and both Low and High altitude Airways
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ VORs, NDBs,  Intersections and Airway databases can be updated every month via the popular Navigraph navdata service
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flight-plan validation via Eurocontrol
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Link to VATSIM flight-plan filing, automatically fills fields for quick filing
 
Loadsheet
 
        Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Realistic airline-style load-sheet
  
Weather Report
 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Detailed weather information (both METAR and TAFs) for departure, destination and alternate airfields
NEW Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Get weather from the popular ActiveSky add-on to ensure you are flying in actual FS conditions
 
 
Editor
 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Allows quick and easy alterations to aircraft performance data, such as fuel burn, limit weights etc.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create new profiles for aircraft not supplied with the software, and share them on our server for other users.
